label: prop-psi-markov-kernel
name: The Swarm Update defines a Markov kernel
natural_language_statement: Under the assumption that each stage of the Swarm Update (cloning, perturbation, status update) is defined by a measurable map driven by a measurable noise kernel on a Polish probability space, the full Swarm Update Operator Ψ defines a Markov kernel on the measurable state space Σ_N. That is, for each state S∈Σ_N, Ψ(S,·) is a probability measure on Σ_N, and for each measurable set A∈B(Σ_N), the map S↦Ψ(S,A) is measurable.
